press_button.description: Press the provided button to power up the printer or to print the document.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob clockwise or anticlockwise to adjust the settings of the printer.

slide_out_slider.description: Slide out the slider to add new pages into the printer or to remove any jammed pages.

slide_in_slider.description: Slide in the slider after adding new pages or once the jammed paper is removed.

clean_printer_body.description: Clean the printer body to remove dust or any other external particles.

maintain_printer.description: Routine check-up and maintenance for printer
